plays.text: Goal scored by Niklas Hagman assisted by Olli Jokinen and Stephane Matteau
Penalty to Marcus Nilson 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Eric Meloche
Penalty to Hans Jonsson 2 minutes for High Sticking Viktor Kozlov
Penalty to Jaroslav Bednar 2 minutes for Interference Guillaume Lefebvre
Penalty to MATTIAS JOHANSSON 2 minutes for Holding Matt Cullen
Penalty to Niklas Hagman 2 minutes for Holding the Stick(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Rico Fata assisted by MATTIAS JOHANSSON and Guillaume Lefebvre
Penalty to Byron Ritchie 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Eric Meloche
Goal scored by Dick Tarnstrom assisted by Guillaume Lefebvre and Mario Lemieux
Penalty to Dan Focht 2 minutes for Hooking Niklas Hagman
Goal scored by Craig Conroy assisted by Jay Bouwmeester and Olli Jokinen
Penalty to Ivan Majesky 2 minutes for High Sticking Mario Lemieux
Goal scored by Olli Jokinen assisted by Viktor Kozlov
Penalty to Viktor Kozlov 2 minutes for Hooking Eric Meloche
Penalty to Viktor Kozlov 2 minutes for Hooking Martin Straka
Penalty to Martin Straka 2 minutes for Diving Viktor Kozlov
Goal scored by Niklas Hagman assisted by Viktor Kozlov and Igor Kravchuk
Penalty to Shawn Heins 2 minutes for Elbowing Mathieu Biron
